channel.title: Purchase to Profits - Real Estate Investing Podcast
channel.itunes:summary:
What do successful real estate investors do differently? How do they set goals, think about real estate, and take action? What deals made the biggest impact on their success?
Host Seth Ferguson and guests delve into how real estate investors set goals, source deals, negotiate, leverage, raise capital, and profit from their real estate portfolio.

image.title: Purchase to Profits - Real Estate Investing Podcast

channel.itunes:author: Seth Ferguson
channel.description:
What do successful real estate investors do differently? How do they set goals, think about real estate, and take action? What deals made the biggest impact on their success?
Host Seth Ferguson and guests delve into how real estate investors set goals, source deals, negotiate, leverage, raise capital, and profit from their real estate portfolio.

item.title: Institutional SFR with Adam Stern
item.itunes:title: Institutional SFR with Adam Stern
item.content:encoded:
Adam has spent the last 10 years in the Institutional SFR Industry having co-founded a real estate technology and brokerage company in early 2010 which he sold in 2018. He spent years brokering large and medium-sized SFR portfolios for many large SFR REITs as well as mid-sized SFR investment firms. Later he founded Strata SFR focusing on the new construction, build for rent market where he sources opportunities by coordinating transactions for SFR REITs, private equity firms, and multi-family investors by coordinating projects with landowners, developers, and builders to create single site detached single-family and townhome communities.

Connect with Adam Stern:

Website: https://stratasfr.com/

Connect with Seth Ferguson: http://www.SethFerguson.org

üìû ONE-ON-ONE CALL: Interested in learning more about real estate investing? I'm opening up my schedule to speak with people who are serious about learning about how real estate investing can significantly impact their lives.

üëâ Go to http://www.CallSeth.com to book a 20-minute call. üëà üè¶ FREE DOWNLOAD - The Top 7 Key Market Drivers Every Real Estate Investor Must Know: http://www.TopMarketDrivers.com
